childMarkdownRemark.html:
You've come across my website, welcome! My name is Bay Phillips and I'm a software engineer who's been living in New York City for over 7 years now. I've been programming since the early 2000's and haven't stopped since.

Who I am

I'm not all that interesting, I promise. I grew up in central New Jersey and attended The Lawrenceville School for high school where I got my first taste of programming. After that, I attended the Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute where I majored in Information Technology Web Sciences (a mouthful, I know) while also meeting lots of my lifelong friends.

I'm engaged to the love of my life, Melanie, and we're slated to get married in the Spring of 2019. I can't wait for this next part of my life and where it takes me ðŸ˜€.

Where I am right now

I've had the privledge of working at Plated for the past 3+ years, initially as an iOS Engineer, but now as a Senior Engineering Manager. I've always loved cooking, and being able to combine my favorite hobby with my career has been an incredible blessing. Not surprising, we're very much hiring!

More to come in the near future...
